price: Rárá (kò rí bí wọ́n ṣe rò ó sí sẹ́), dájúdájú wọn yóò wà nínú gàgá, wọn kò sì níí rí Olúwa wọn ní ọjọ́ yẹn.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
